Description:

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 It has good damage both in health and armor, as well as increases visibility.

 Suitable for modes: BR, Kings Of HIll, SABOTAGE

A good set if you want to have a lot of health.

 It has a lot of health, as well as a good rate of fire and movement speed, also increases visibility.

 Suitable for modes: BR, KH, SABO

A set in which you will kill everyone and everything.

 It has a lot of damage, both in armor and in health.

 Suitable for all modes

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 It has good damage both in health and armor, as well as increases visibility.

 Suitable for modes: BR, KH, SABO

 It has a lot of health, as well as a good rate of fire and movement speed, also increases visibility.

 It has good damage both in health and armor, as well as increases visibility.

 It has a lot of health, as well as a good rate of fire and movement speed, also increases visibility.

 Suitable for modes: BR, KH, SABO

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 Has a good overview and damage.

 Suitable for modes: BR, KH

A popular set.

 It has 3 cartridges in the clip, which allows you to kill everyone, as well as greater movement speed, more damage and the radius of grenades.

 Suitable for all modes

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 It has excellent movement speed, as well as armor-piercing damage.

 Suitable for modes: BR, KH

Recommended set.

 The set allows you to imagine the hero as he was before nerf (meta).

 Suitable for all modes

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 It has excellent movement speed, visibility, as well as damage.

 Suitable for modes: BR, KH

Recommended set.

 It has a good overview, survivability, -scatter and damage.

 Suitable for all modes

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 It has excellent movement speed, damage, as well as more ammo, which is a huge plus for this hero, since he has few ammo.

 Also, instead of an echo radar, you can put a gas grenade, depending on your preferences.

 Suitable for all modes

The optimal set with personal equipment.

 It has excellent movement speed, visibility, as well as a durable shield.

 Suitable for SQUAD mode

Recommended set.

 Has a good overview, more ammo, -scatter and damage.

 Suitable for all modes

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 Has excellent movement speed, damage and more ammo.

Set to range.

 It has a good firing range, long clearance and damage.

 It has a spread, which helps to hit the target more often, as well as more health, good speed and damage.

Universal set.

 It has a good firing range, a solid wall, high movement speed, as well as high damage and visibility.

Set for a lot of damage.

The optimal set without personal equipment.

 Has -scatter, more health, damage and range.

Set for survivability.

 Has a large amount of health and huge damage.

 If you don't like the range, then you can put a personal heart.

 It has a good range, penetration ability, damage and -scatter.
